title: What major events happened during the year 1514? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Battle of Chaldiran ends with a decisive victory for the Sultan Selim I, Ottoman Empire, over the Shah Ismail I, founder of the Safavid dynasty. (23. August 1514) Marriage of Louis XII of France and Mary Tudor. (9. October 1514) Battle of Orsha in one of the biggest battles of the century, Lithuanians and Poles defeat the Russian army. (8. September 1514)
